Paragraph: Suzuki coupling reaction of the dibromide 2a,b with 3-thienylboronic acid gave 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione ( 3a,b ).

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| dibromide 2a,b |
| 3-thienylboronic acid |
| 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b) |

(Note: The numbers in parentheses are considered part of the material names in this context.)
